channel.title: pubblications on Andrea Cirillo
channel.description: Recent content in pubblications on Andrea Cirillo

item.title: R data mining
item.description: R data mining is a data mining crime book, a new kind of book we developed with good guys at Packt and the great statistician Enrico Pegoraro. What is a data mining crime book? It is a book stucture to teach you data mining fundamentals while immersing you in a crime case. Within R data mining you will be immersed into the life of a wholesale company, where suddenly a misterious drop in profits arises.
